revised_title: Temperature Variations in Toronto, Canada: A Meteorological Study from 1841 to 1852
tldr: The author presents a study of temperature variations in Toronto, Canada, from 1841 to 1852, using hourly observations made at the Magnetical and Meteorological Observatory. The data is analyzed to provide mean temperatures for each hour and month, as well as a method for calculating temperatures on specific days using a formula derived from the collected data.
